snippet.title: ALIEN XENOBLASTER - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
BUY THE GAME HERE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2051590/ALIEN_XENOBLASTER/

== GAME DESC ==
A thrilling new arcade themed game starring an enraged alien on her way to eliminate an entire planet full of unkept aliens. As she sets bait with cardboard cutouts of attractive women, battle your way through 6 worlds with loads of content and loser goobers...

== STORY == 
Follow an angry space alien as she sets sail to eliminate the inhabitants of GOOBTOPIA; an inferior planet of uglies. With the artistic help of her girlfriend; sultry bait will lead Goobers to their inevitable doom.

== LINKS ==
Our OFFICIAL Discord: https://discord.gg/sG6ssd9ZVY
Our OFFICIAL Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlienXenoGame

#alienxenoblaster #indiegame #indiegamedev
